fields.name: Aal Shanghai
fields.full_description:
MV "Aal Shanghai" ----------------- CallSign: V7XW6 Ex-Name(s) : Shandong Huanghai HCY-96 Type : Handysize Sub type : Multi-Purpose Ship Gears : 2x350T Cranes
+ 1x100T Cranes
+ 1x50T Cranes
Box-shaped Hatch Dimensions (L x B) No. 1: 12.64 x 15.40 m No. 2P: 25.28 x 12.80 m / No. 2S: 25.28 x 10.30 m No. 3P: 37.92 x 12.80 m / No. 3S: 37.92 x 10.30 m No. 4P: 31.60 x 12.80 m / No. 3S: 31.60 x 10.30 m No. 5: 12.64 x 24.10 m Built : 2012 by SHANDONG HUANGHAI Flag : Marshall Islands Class : Germanischer Lloyd DWT/Draft: 32,106 MT DWT / 11.20 m SSW LOA/Beam : 193.90 m (loa) / 28.20 m (beam) LBP : 183 m Int'l tonnage : 23,930 GT / 10,570 NT Summer salt : 32,106 MT DWT / 11.20 m SSW Grain/Bale : 39,507 cbm Grain / 39,500 cbm Bale Ho/Ha : 5/8 Hold capacity : No.1 : 2,135.70 cbm No.2 : 8,153.50 cbm No.3 : 13,945.40 cbm No.4 : 11,539.70 cbm No.5 : 3,732.40 cbm Tank top strength (MT/m2) :22.00 Strengthened for heavy cargo CO2 fitted Depth moulded : 15.5 m Speed/cons : ------------ Average : abt 13 kts on IFO 27.5 MT (380CST) Average : abt 12 kts on IFO 24.7 MT (380CST) Port idle : 3.5 IFO Port working : 7.5 IFO ------------------------------------------------------- Above speed / consumption in good weather conditions upto/incl Beaufort Force 4 and Douglas Sea State 3 with no adverse current and no negative influence of swell. ------------------------------------------------------- IMO : 9498377 Shipowner : AUSTRAL ASIA LINE ----------------------------------------------------- All details given in good faith and without guarantee
